chunks.text: So here we are going to learn some basic basics of Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: So Python is a dynamically typed object oriented programming language.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And it is a general purpose scripting language.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Which you can use to develop web development.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: For data science.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can use it for general purpose scripting.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: For example, if you want to make a utility which

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: moves the files of a particular folder in a different folder

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can do all this with the help of Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Along with that, you can make a GUI with the help of Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Python is very famous for its readability.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: To make a variable in Python, you can make it like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You will say a is equal to 5. And to run it in Jupyter,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can enter it as you enter the control.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And after that, you will click on the bottom.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Otherwise, you can click on the plus button and make a new cell.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: As I have written, b is equal to 32.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And as soon as I enter the control,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: it will execute.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Now if I enter the A plus,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can see that it has become 37.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I want to save this notebook, I will do the control S.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can click on the kernel and restart the kernel.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And run all cells.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And this will make all the cells run.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can make the variables in Python like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: As you saw, the variables in Python were numbers.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I want, I can make strings.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Like I can write str is equal to Harry.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And now if I enter the control, it will be Harry.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I will name it name is equal to Harry.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Now I will tell you the difference between the control and the shift enter.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I enter the control,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: this cell executes and you stay in the same cell.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you enter the shift,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: this cell executes and you come into a new cell.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you enter the shift,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: if you want to write the code,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can enter the control.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can save the notebook by controlling it.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you want to save the computer,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you should not have any problem.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: We have seen how you can make variables in Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you want to print anything,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can use the print function.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can write H-E-L-L-O.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: After writing the world, I will hit the control enter.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: And you see, I stayed in the same cell and the world output came.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I entered the shift, I would have gone to the other cell.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can print anything.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you want to write some comments,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can write a single line comment.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is a comment.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I enter the control,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: there will be no difference in the line.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: These lines are used to add information.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: In Jupyter, we do markdown videos.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Most of the cases, we use less comments.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Yes, sometimes, we use comments like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can see, this will print

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Hello World on the screen.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I entered the control,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: and this will print Hello World.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can see the variables, data types.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Data types automatically get inferred.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: A is equal to 5, meaning A is an integer.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I enter the control,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: and if I enter the type of A,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: you can see the class has entered.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is an integer variable.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: At the same time, if I enter the type of name

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: and enter the shift,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: it automatically shows the class str.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: It shows the type of variable

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: and tells the type itself.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: When I wrote the name in double quotes,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: it was understood that this is a string.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is the basic basic of printing.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: How do we make a comment?

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is a single line comment.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can make a multi line comment like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I have already told you about the variables.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You don't have to tell what integer, class,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: what string, or boolean are.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You have to store any integer.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can write x is equal to 10.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: y is equal to 3.14.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: The point of this is enough to explain the Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is a floating point number.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: The name is equal to Jack.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If it is written in double quotes, it automatically gets inferred.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If we write this v, jacked like this,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: then it will be true.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I have made a variable like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can do this easily.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can do type checking like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can do type casting like this.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I will tell you how to find the type.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I will tell you how to do type casting.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I want to tell you one thing.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I used print function.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I write type of name here,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: and enter the shift,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: then the Jupyter Notebook automatically shows us the output.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: We don't need to print function to see the output.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I have written type of name here.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: It automatically told me here.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I have written a is equal to 4.566.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I have written b is equal to 5.677.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If I write in double quotes,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: then it will be a string.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Now I will write print a plus b.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Now tell me what will be the print.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Many people think that these numbers will add up.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: But it doesn't.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I will enter the shift here.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Since these are strings, it becomes a concatenation.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: If you want these numbers to sum up,

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: then you will write print and say

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: integer version of a plus integer version of b.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: Once again, I will not write print.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: We don't need to print.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I will enter.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is 5677 and 4566.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: It has added up to 10243.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: You can type casting here.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: This is called type casting in Python.

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: I am giving you a refresher

chunks.title: Variables data types and typecasting
chunks.text: of Python.
